site_name: Land To The Rear Of 368 And 370
description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission P/2012/4716 dated 14/01/2013 for Construction of a pair of semi-detached (4 bedroom) dwellings with a basement level; parking for 2 cars (one for each dwelling); associated amenity space to front and rear, and landscaping with access from Birch Grove (Amendments to ref: PP/2012/2783, including part first floor rear extensions, basement levels, and lightwells to each dwelling)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Proposed Site Plan, C0512 (01) 301X, C0512 (01) 302X, C0512 (01) 303X, C0512 (01) 304X, C0512 (00) 009X, C0512 (00) 010X, C0512 (00) 011X, C0512 (00) 012X and C0512 (00) 090X unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.   Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
